flawed_nl_solution:
She uses 3 ounces of beans per day because 2 x 1.5 = <<2*1.5=3>>3
She uses 21 ounces of beans per week because 7 x 3 = <<7*3=21>>21
She buys 2 bags of beans per week because 21 / 10.5 = <<21/10.5=2>>2
She spends $16 on the beans per week because 2 x 8 = <<16=16>>16
She spends $8 on the milk per week because 4 x (1/2) = <<4*(1/2)=8>>8
She spends $24 per week on her coffee because 16 + 8 = <<16+8=24>>24

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 8. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
